title: kamalAmbA anaiyE
sahitya:
kamalAmbA anaiyE gaurI unran kamala caraNam tuNaiyE dEvi shrI


anupallavi

  kamalAlaya kSEtra nivAsini amba karuNA sAgari nIla vilOcani shrI


caraNam    kamalAlayattaDa punita nIrADi kapaTam akhilA pEran pODun pugazh pADi
 amalE abhayamenraDi malar tEDi amarar muni varum anudinam koNDADum
